fullDescription.option: Missing values are imputed as mean intensitiy minus x time its standard deviation
if more than x percent are missing for the variable it is considered as sparse
If false, sparse metabolites are discarded, otherwise variables of sparse metabolites are generalized to 0 (missing) and 1 (measured)

ports.inPort: Data table with measurements. Each column represents one measured variable and each row represents one sample.
ports.outPort: Like experiment data but with imputed missing values

views.view: View STDERR and STDOUT of the executed R command
